sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import moment from 'moment' export default class SquareProject extends Component { render () { const { index, project, showModalDelete } = this.props return (

{project.name}

{project.style} Style

Updated: {moment(project.updatedAt).format('DD/MM/YYYY, k:m')}

Created: {moment(project.createdAt).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}

) } } SquareProject.propTypes = { index: PropTypes.string, project: PropTypes.object, showModalDelete: PropTypes.func }
